caveats:
Make sure kube-ps1 is loaded from your ~/.zshrc or ~/.bashrc:
  For zsh:
  source "/home/tim/.linuxbrew/opt/kube-ps1/share/kube-ps1.sh"
  PROMPT='$(kube_ps1)'$PROMPT

  For Bash:
  source "/home/tim/.linuxbrew/opt/kube-ps1/share/kube-ps1.sh"
  PS1="[$(kube_ps1)]$ "
desc: Kubernetes prompt info for bash and zsh
name: kube-ps1
